attributes.action: To Make Cyclist road users go through a written and Cyclist road test
attributes.additional_details: It would help protect other road users from damage the cyclist cause !! Through lack of Highway Code .
attributes.background: To bring in a road test especially for Cyclists and bring in a law that states cyclists need to go through similar test as car drivers do and get a “ Pass “ certificate and a cyclist License. Also to bring in that cyclist get an “ Insurance “ and a cyclist MOT to make sure the bikes are road worthy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217
